insert(options, doneCallback, failCallback) → {Promise.<baqend.binding.Entity>}

Inserts a new object. Inserts the object if it doesn't exists and raise an error if the object already exist.
Parameters:
Name Type Argument Description
options Object <optional>
 The insertion options
Properties
Name Type Argument Default Description
depth Number | Boolean <optional>
 0 The object depth which will be inserted. Depth 0 insert this object only, true inserts objects by reachability.
refresh Boolean <optional>
 false Refresh the local object state with the remote state.
doneCallback baqend.binding.Entity~doneCallback <optional>
 Called when the operation succeed.
failCallback baqend.binding.Entity~failCallback <optional>
 Called when the operation failed.

save(options, doneCallback, failCallback) → {Promise.<baqend.binding.Entity>}

Saves the object. Inserts the object if it doesn't exists and updates the object if the object exist.
Parameters:
Name Type Argument Description
options Object <optional>
 The save options
Properties
Name Type Argument Default Description

 false Force the save operation, the version will not be validated.
depth Number | Boolean <optional>

 false Refresh the local object state with the remote state.

update(options, doneCallback, failCallback) → {Promise.<baqend.binding.Entity>}

Updates an existing object. Updates the object if it exists and raise an error if the object doesn't exist.
Parameters:
Name Type Argument Description
options Object <optional>
 The update options
Properties
Name Type Argument Default Description
force Boolean <optional>
 false Force the update operation, the version will not be validated, only existence will be checked.
depth Number | Boolean <optional>
 0 The object depth which will be updated. Depth 0 updates this object only, true updates objects by reachability.
refresh Boolean <optional>
 false Refresh the local object state with the remote state.

 Called when the operation succeed.
failCallback baqend.binding.Entity~failCallback <optional>
 Called when the operation failed.
